reviews.review: Hile açmadığım halde VAC ban yedim bu oyunun ta amk gaben fuck you
as long as you pay for prime matchmaking, you should have a good time.  otherwise you'll run into a bunch of hackers

Jogo muito, nunca morrerá  o único que estraga são os noobs que usam qualquer tipo de hack por falta de habilidade. :D
Sehr gutes spiel wo man etwas skill gebaucht um zu "Leveln"
Very competitive but still a really good time
pfu manca bata l ar cacatu de joc,cand pun ochiu pe ak zboara tot cu agheu
El counter de toda la life, pero meten cosas nuevas que incitan a jugar.
Após atualizações, a interface do menu principal e de escolha de time deixou o jogo pesado, lento pra carregar partidas em computadores com configuração mínima especifica.

Amazing game at it's core, but a lackluster anti-cheat, and new extremely easy access to prime matchmaking has made this once great game infested with cheaters every other game. But when you get that rare game where everyone is legitimate, it's an incredible experience.
its so bad but so good
DENE GÖR AMA HİLE ÇOK FAZLA
top joguem fale muito a pena
90% игр с читерами и начало игры с ботами. Не рекомендую играть или тем более покупать премиум. Valve - shit!
Если не играть, то игра нормальная!

Sehr cooles Spiel. Trotz seines Alters, immer noch ein Team basierendes First-Person-Shooter Game. Macht sehr viel Spaß mit Freunden zusammen zu spielen.

Leider merkt man von Cheatern immer häufiger, mehr auf die Reports achten, wäre schön.

Want a game where if you want to win you need your mums credit card to get better cheats than the other team? Then this game is for you! 
Want to support valve to line their fat pockets while they do absolutely nothing to fix the cheating issue? Then this game is for you!
Want a free game where no one cares if they get their account banned because they can just make a brand new one for free without getting caught? Then this game is for you!
Want a game where the devs focus on ways to take your money with skins and not improve the game or community? Then this game is for you!

I've literally spennt over 1000 hours playing this game. help me

EInfach ein geiles Spiel..
Mann muss etwas Zeit investieren um die Basics zu lernen aber danach macht es einfach nur mega Bock.
Am besten nur in Team suchen weil sonst hast du meist mindestens ein Teammate der toxic ist
10/10

Fun game. Although you pretty much forced to use m4 and ak47.  If you dont have a loyalty badge (paying for the game) you will run into a lot of hackers. 7/10
